answers.answer: Sometimes eczema feels like dry skin that can't be relieved by moisturizing.  I suggest over-the-counter 1% hydrocortisone cream.  Try that for a few days.  It might then be a good idea to see a skin doctor for confirmation or other advice.  I see no connection with diabetes or other disease.Best.Dr. Rockoff
